name: Translation
title: Gcloud
Translate
Translation
description:
Translation

Represents a translation query result. Returned by Gcloud::Translate::Api#translate.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
translate = gcloud.translate

translation = translate.translate "Hello world!", to: "la"

puts translation #=> Salve mundi!

translation.from #=> "en"
translation.origin #=> "Hello world!"
translation.to #=> "la"
translation.text #=> "Salve mundi!"

methods.name: origin
title: Gcloud
Translate
Translation#origin
methods.description: The original query text that was translated.

methods.name: to
title: Gcloud
Translate
Translation#to
methods.description: The target language into which the text was translated.

methods.name: from
title: Gcloud
Translate
Translation#from
methods.description: The source language from which the text was translated.

methods.name: detected?
title: Gcloud
Translate
Translation#detected?
methods.description: Determines if the source language was detected by the Google Cloud Translate API.

returns.description: true if the source language was detected by the Translate service, false if the source language was provided in the request
